fr.upmc.datacenter.dispatcher.interfaces

Interface RequestDispatcherManagementI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    fr.upmc.components.interfaces.ComponentImplementedI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.OfferedI, java.rmi.Remote, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.RequiredI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RequestDispatcher, RequestDispatcherManagementConnector, RequestDispatcherManagementInboundPort, RequestDispatcherManagementOutboundPort

    public interface RequestDispatcherManagementI
extends fr.upmc.components.interfaces.OfferedI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.RequiredI
    The interface RequestDispatcherManagementI defines the methods to manage the Request Dispatcher.

    Description

    Author:
    Cédric Ribeiro et Mokrane Kadri
